name: Planar Mazeum
description:
Created for The Museum(s) Jam.

A world of sculpture and confusion with chance encounters. Most are unique. Look, read, talk, do not touch.

Controls: Mouse and keyboard (WASD + mouselook, left click to interact). See pause menu (Escape) for additional instructions and credits.

Note: Mac and Linux versions are universal builds (32 + 64 bit) and limited in testing, and therefore considered experimental.
